hero.title: About me
hero.aboutme1: I am a <0>Front-end Developer</0> currently a student specializing in microcomputer systems and networks, based in Spain.
hero.aboutme2: As an avid learner, I constantly seek opportunities to grow and explore new challenges. I love experimenting with new techniques and coding on personal projects, which helps me refine my skills and discover my unique style while making a real impact with the products I work with.
hero.aboutme3: In this portfolio, <0>you can find samples of my recent works and the skills I am developing.</0> To me, every project here is a step toward mastering my craft, so I hope it is not only objectively great but that passion is shown in the final piece.

contact.title: Contact
contact.text1: Thank you for visiting my portfolio! Whether you have a project idea, a question, or just want to chat, feel free to get in touch.
contact.text3: if you'd like to connect. Additionally, I'm available on
contact.text4: if that's more convenient for you.
